patthana22.31:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.31:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.31:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nooghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.31:8.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ noyogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.31:10.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nonīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana22.31:12.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca anidassanaappaṭigho parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
